backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles with access control and a full enquiry system including submission, admin viewing, deletion, pagination, and counting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries of all frontend source files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the app and loading the main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app configuring TanStack Router routes for home, admin, and contact pages within a themed layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/EnquiriesL: Admin UI component listing enquiries with formatted details and delete actions using React Query hooks.
Guard component enforcing Internet Identity login and admin checks before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/enquiry/EnquiryF: React enquiry form with validation, submission via hook, error handling, and success messaging.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with branding, quick navigation links, contact numbers, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header providing navigation, mobile menu toggle, and smooth scrolling to sections or contact page.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section showcasing key features of the tuition centre with cards and an illustration.
frontend/src/components/sections/Classes: Section listing class groups, descriptions, subjects offered, and themed cards for each level.
frontend/src/components/sections/Enquiry: Section displaying enquiry heading and description, embedding the EnquiryForm component.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with title, intro text, call‑to‑action buttons, and decorative hero image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Teachin: Renders the teaching approach section with a list of learning methods and an illustrative image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnquiriesAdmin.ts: Provides hooks for admin actions like fetching, deleting, and counting enquiries and checking admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitEnquiry.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit new enquiries and invalidate the enquiries list on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles, color variables, typography, and global theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEnquiriesPage.ts: Admin page that shows enquiry management UI with navigation and access control.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information, office hours, and phone numbers in styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage by rendering hero, about, classes, teaching approach, and enquiry sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters (including hash routes) and persisting them in sessionStorage, with helpers to clear parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, spacing, typography, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented ICP dapp features, including React/Tailwind frontend, Motoko backend, enquiry flow, admin auth, and asset setup.
